title: Rishi Sunak – 2018 Comments on Digital Innovation in Local Government
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rishi Sunak, the then Local Government Minister, on 4 July 2018.
content:
Whether it’s an app to report fly-tipping, or slick online services to pay your Council Tax, many local authorities are at the forefront of digital innovation.
